column4: anthrem... what are the advantages of using Fedora over Ubuntu.. I thought of installing Fedora alongside my Ubuntu.
fedora core is a disaster compared to ubuntu

ahh .. I only thought of installing Fedora but after looking at screenshots for many other distributions and reading that most of the same packages are available and most use Gnome or KDE ... I'm wondering why I would want to leave Ubuntu for another distribution?
believe me, ubuntu is a GOOD distro and make many others seem dissapointing exept for perhaps slackware
